Package com.github.cyberryan1.cybercore.spigot.utils

Class CyberColorUtils

java.lang.Object
com.github.cyberryan1.cybercore.spigot.utils.CyberColorUtils
public final class CyberColorUtils extends Object
Color translation utilities

Thanks to Kody Simpson for the getColored(String) and getColoredComponent(String) methods. Link to the original code can be found here

  • Method Details

    • setPrimaryColor

      public static void setPrimaryColor(String color)
      Sets the primary color for the plugin. This is what "&p" within strings will be replaced with.
      Parameters:
      color - The primary color (color code, like "&b")

    • setSecondaryColor

      public static void setSecondaryColor(String color)
      Sets the secondary color for the plugin. This is what "&s" within strings will be replaced with.
      Parameters:
      color - The secondary color (color code, like "&7")

    • getPrimaryColor

      public static String getPrimaryColor()
      Returns:
      The primary color for the plugin (color code, like "&b")

    • getSecondaryColor

      public static String getSecondaryColor()
      Returns:
      The secondary color for the plugin (color code, like "&7")

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Parameters:
      msgs - The strings to color
      Returns:
      The colored strings

    • reverseColor

      public static String reverseColor(String msg)
      Reverses the colors of a message into the respective color codes.
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to reverse the colors of
      Returns:
      The reversed message

    • deleteColor

      public static String deleteColor(String msg)
      Removes all color from a message
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to remove color from
      Returns:
      The message without color

    • getUncolored

      public static String getUncolored(String msg)
      Removes all color AND color codes from a message
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to remove color from
      Returns:
      The message without color nor color codes
